Articles.Content:
Introducing the AUR-1 Bomber! The first of the AUR military series (more to be made). The AUR-1 Bomber is a small but manoeuvrable bomber that specialises in taking down small targets or reconnoissance.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

If anyone wants me to pimp it out with BD armoury, or the whole series (to come) vote in the poll that I've put up.

Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/k2m0ys0sceenn3e/AUR-1%20Bomber.craft?dl=0

Edited November 17, 2014 by oarum
